Name: FLERP
About the game: FLERP is an arcade tower defense roguelite where you defend your core from massive hordes of enemies. Recruit units from the shop and build up a team of powerful synergies to completely dominate the opposition. Gameplay Recruit units from the shop Your units will automatically attack nearby enemies Gain gold and interest with every level, which can be spent in the shop Find powerful items to enhance your builds even further Features 40+ units to recruit 40+ items to find 14 classes with their own synergies
